comment: course consists of textbook reading & lectures in class going over the material. lots of class discussions & she always gave space for everyone. one group presentation and the final was a solo presentation. periodic in-class quizzes (ez 10 q) & occas. xtra credit just for coming to class. tests were also pretty easy 50 q's each. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

There rly should be more on her about her. Kind, gets your attention, actually educates, smart, active practicing therapist with a PHD. She is incredibly intelligent. actually felt like I learned. Easy writing assignments and quizzes, easy project and presentation, prepares you for fairly easy tests, good content. TAKE HER!! She really is great.
TAKE HER! She is absolutely amazing. She deeply cares for her students and wants them to succeed. She is actually amazing. She opens the class to discussion and it is so fun. She is amazing!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
